About Agoda 

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to know our team – Observability Platform in Agoda

Within the WhiteFalcon team, we build and maintain Agoda’s time series database and log aggregation system. We process tens of millions of measurements per second and hundreds of terabytes of logs per day in multiple datacenters, powering thousands of dashboards and alerts. Our biggest challenges are to support the ever-growing need for collecting more data, faster and at lower cost.

In This Role, You’ll Get to

Build fault-tolerant, horizontally scalable solutions running in multi-tenant environments
Solve challenging problems in distributed and highly concurrent environment
Impact all developers in Agoda, providing better observability instruments

What You’ll Need To Succeed

At least 8 years of experience writing performant and scalable code using JVM (Java/Scala/Kotlin) or Rust (C++) languages
User/dev experience of one of the following products: Prometheus, InfluxDB, Victoria Metrics, Elasticsearch, Grafana Loki
Production experience with messaging queues (Kafka)
Deep understanding of concurrency and multithreading
Value code simplicity and performance
Demonstrate proficiency in communication and collaboration skill

It’s Great If You Have

Strong background in DB internals, indexes, data formats (AVRO, Protobuf)
You generally understand observability data types, such as logs and metrics
Profilers, debuggers, tracers hide no secrets from you, especially in a Linux environment
Experience building large-scale time series data stores and monitoring solutions
Experience with S3 (Ceph), Elasticsearch, Grafana and other open-source components
You can get down to the low-level when needed

Job Titles: Lead Data Engineer – Data Platform (Bangkok-Based, Relocation Provided)
Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

Get to Know Our Team

The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.

Why Agoda Hadoop Apps Team?

Joining this team, you will be solving some of the most difficult challenges out there today for the Hadoop ecosystem. We focus largely on building user tools and applications for other teams to use, most of these are built on top of Yarn utilizing Apache Spark as well as other cutting edge technologies.

We are also the engine that drives a fully functional world class data warehouse on top of Hadoop, this means providing tools to define data cubes and syncing high load of data from a processing Hadoop to other systems using in-house built Applications.

 In this Role, you will get to 

 Lead the team technically in improving scalability, stability, accuracy, speed and efficiency of our existing Data Platform 
 Build, administer and scale Data Platform 
 Be comfortable navigating the following technology stack: S3, Kubernetes, KubeFlow, Spark, SQL, Impala, Scala, java, Python, scripting (Bash/Python) etc. 
 Work with experienced engineers to identify and build tools to automate many large-scale data platform management 

What You’ll Need To Succeed

 Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science /Information Systems/Engineering/related field 
 6+ years of experience in Data Platform Administration eg. Hadoop, S3, AWS, Google Cloud etc. 
 6+ years of experience in Kubernetes Administration 
 Good experience in Apache Spark performance tuning and debugging 
 Good level understanding of JVM and either Java or Scala 
 Experience in WorkFlow Scheduler eg. KubeFlow, AirFlow, Oozie etc. 
 SQL experience eg. SparkSql, Impala, BigQuery, Presto/Trino, StarRocks etc. 
 Experience debugging and reasoning about production issues is desirable 
 Analytical problem-solving capabilities & experience. 
 Systems administration skills in Linux 

 It’s great if you have 

 Experience working with Open-source products 
 Python/Shell scripting skills 
 Working in an agile environment using test driven methodologies

Job Titles: Lead Software Engineering – SRE (Bangkok-based, Relocation Provided)
Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

Get to Know our Team: 

The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.

The Opportunity:

Lead Software Engineer in SRE is a part of data team who developing solutions for analytic production incidents, we are working close with our DevOps engineers, NOC, QA, and service owners to improve system reliability with an emphasis on safe deployment and monitoring with anomaly detection technique.

In this Role, you’ll get to:

Help establish and apply SRE best practices, standards and policies in hybrid cloud environments with hybrid workloads where both VMs and containers are used
Develop systems to prevent outages through automatic detection and remediation
Increase observability of system health to improve availability and system uptime
Providing guidance and expertise to the team
Influence, design and create new architectures, standards and methods for large-scale enterprise systems
Document and present methodologies to operations, engineering and executive teams
Coach and develop software engineers, looks for opportunities to improve both technical and people through highly effective 1-1s and growth plans

What You’ll Need to Succeed:

Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems/Engineering/related field
4+ years in a technical role supporting IT products
Ability to multitask and pivot when necessary in a fast-paced environment
Hands-on experience with the whole SDLC: Requirement, Design, Code, Test, Deploy
Deep understanding of computer networks
Proficient in at least one programming language (e.g. Ruby, JavaScript/NodeJS, Python)
Understanding of VMs, docker/rkt containers and their applications, K8s, private cloud knowledge is plus
Hands-on experience designing and implementing monitoring and alerting systems
Experience in Data platforms like SQL or Hadoop
Excellent verbal and written English communication skills
Incident management process, analytical problem-solving capabilities & experience & can lead the incident

Job Titles: Lead Data Engineer – Data Platform (Bangkok-Based, Relocation Provided)
Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

Get to Know Our Team

The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.

Why Agoda Hadoop Apps Team?

Joining this team, you will be solving some of the most difficult challenges out there today for the Hadoop ecosystem. We focus largely on building user tools and applications for other teams to use, most of these are built on top of Yarn utilizing Apache Spark as well as other cutting edge technologies.

We are also the engine that drives a fully functional world class data warehouse on top of Hadoop, this means providing tools to define data cubes and syncing high load of data from a processing Hadoop to other systems using in-house built Applications.

 In this Role, you will get to 

 Lead the team technically in improving scalability, stability, accuracy, speed and efficiency of our existing Data Platform 
 Build, administer and scale Data Platform 
 Be comfortable navigating the following technology stack: S3, Kubernetes, KubeFlow, Spark, SQL, Impala, Scala, java, Python, scripting (Bash/Python) etc. 
 Work with experienced engineers to identify and build tools to automate many large-scale data platform management 

What You’ll Need To Succeed

 Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science /Information Systems/Engineering/related field 
 6+ years of experience in Data Platform Administration eg. Hadoop, S3, AWS, Google Cloud etc. 
 6+ years of experience in Kubernetes Administration 
 Good experience in Apache Spark performance tuning and debugging 
 Good level understanding of JVM and either Java or Scala 
 Experience in WorkFlow Scheduler eg. KubeFlow, AirFlow, Oozie etc. 
 SQL experience eg. SparkSql, Impala, BigQuery, Presto/Trino, StarRocks etc. 
 Experience debugging and reasoning about production issues is desirable 
 Analytical problem-solving capabilities & experience. 
 Systems administration skills in Linux 

 It’s great if you have 

 Experience working with Open-source products 
 Python/Shell scripting skills 
 Working in an agile environment using test driven methodologies
